_meanings:
(often
used merely for the <ab>abl.</ab> of the 
relative pronoun {#yad#})

{@--1@} From whence
(referring to persons or things),
from what, from which place or 

quarter; {#yatastvayA jYAnamaSezamAptaM#} <ls>R. 5. 4</ls>
({#yataH#} = {#yasmAt#} from whom); {#yataSca#} 
{#BayamASaMketprAcIM tAM kalpayoddiSaM#} <ls>Ms. 7. 189.</ls>

{@--2@} For which reason, wherefore, in
consequence of which.

{@--4@} From
which time forward, ever since.

originating in, or
sprung from, which.
